item.title: Trump raises tariffs on Canada over for not cutting anti-tariffs ad faster
item.description: President Trump said he is increasing tariffs on Canada by 10% because of an ad that was broadcast in Canada that featured audio from a 1987 speech fr...

item.title: Trump slams report that says he will name ballroom after himself
item.description: President Trump said any reports that he intends to call the new ballroom after himself are "fake news."

item.title: Harris on being future president: 'Possibly'
item.description: Former Vice President Kamala Harris suggested she's not completely against the idea of running for president in the future.

item.title: Abrego Garcia objects: Don't send me to Liberia
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia now says he fears persecution if he's sent to Liberia, as America's most prominent migrant tries again to derail a looming deport...

item.title: Trump says he could compromise with China
item.description: President Trump said that concessions could be on the table to alleviate the trade tensions between the U.S. and China.
